title: Carrs Station, Georgia
text:
Carrs Station is an <a href="unincorporated%20community">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Hancock%20County%2C%20Georgia">Hancock County</a>, in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia</a>.
History.
A post office called Carrs Station was established in 1874, and remained in operation until 1950. A variant name was "Carrs". The community most likely was named after J. D. Carr, a local merchant and railroad employee.
